controller module

mod_reactor_controller implements the class: Controller

The module mod_reactor_controller runs the hardware mod_reactor_controller of the modular photoreactor as an instance of the Controller class.

class controller.Controller[source]

Bases: object

cb_global_button_handling(index, pressed)[source]

Callback that configures global button functions (button pressed = true).

Parameters

  • index (int) – Index number of the gui button.

  • pressed (boolean) – State of gui button (true if button is pressed).
